meaningMnemonic: You know that 詐欺 is "fraud." An <kanji>expert</kanji> in fraud is someone who does this it lot, and possibly for a living. That's a <vocabulary>swindler</vocabulary>, a <vocabulary>con artist</vocabulary>,  or a <vocabulary>scammer</vocabulary>.
readingMnemonic: This is a jukugo word that uses the on'yomi readings of the kanji. You should be able to read this on your own. Will help to know the reading of 詐欺 as well.
